steps.title: Introduction
steps.details: 1. In this guide, we’ll show you everything you need to know about your learning transcript.

steps.title: Accessing Learner Transcript
steps.details: 1. To access your transcript, you can click the My Transcript link on the homepage, or the My Transcript item in the Menu, under Learning.

hotspots.title: Transcript
hotspots.description: This link takes you directly to your learning transcript

steps.title: Filtering Transcript
steps.details:
1. The training is already sorted by due date in ascending order.

  2. You can filter the Training status by All, Active, Completed, or Archived in the Training Status dropdown.

  3. You can sort and filter the visible items, or search for a specific title using the search bar.

steps.title: Launch Training
steps.details:
1. For each training item you will see a black button with dropdown titled Launch, Open Curriculum, or Select Session. This depends on the type of training assigned.

  2. The buttons allow quick action to the next step.

    1. Launch button opens the learning so you are able to progress through the content.

    2. Open Curriculum button opens the course curriculum to either the beginning or where you last left off.

    3. Select a Session button takes you to the Event page to be able to review the available sessions in order to request (enroll) a date and time that works for you.

  3. Using the dropdown arrow will allow you to View the Training Details which provides you with all of the additional information associated with the learning object.

steps.title: Print Certificates
steps.details:
1. If you need to print a certificate for a completed learning, simply filter your transcript to the Completed Training Status.

  2. Then click the View Certificate button for the learning needed.

  3. This will open a new window with your certificate of completion to either save as a PDF or print.

steps.title: Retake Completed Lessons
steps.details:
1. To review previously completed content, filter your transcript to the Completed Training Status.

  2. Then, once you find the content you would like to review, click the black dropdown and select the Open Curriculum or Launch options.

  3. For Curriculum, once the content is opened, you will see another drop down in the top right of your screen. You can either click Request, which will assign a new instance of the training to your Active transcript, or click Launch, which will open the content in a new tab for you to review.

hotspots.title: Launch vs Open Curriculum
hotspots.description: If you are reviewing an Online Class instead of a Curriculum, the Launch option would populate instead of Open Curriculum.
